resources.string: Wait until all players are connected then click play
You\'re stuck in a room with your phones. There is one only issue, unfortunately locked with password… Look around and find different items, you\'ll maybe able to use them to unlock that door!

You assemble the paper fragments… An enigma then appears, with four possible answers. A small barely readable writing on the bottom tells : \"The only room exit\'s code is one of these answers. Please choose carefully, as there is only one unlock attempt. The Iomere project workgroup declines all responsibility with regards to any problems occurring as a result of being stuck in this room forever.\"
